text: Thanks <@UJQNNKKHN>! Would you primarily use these types of rich text modules inside blog? Or would you use them in other places as well?
Right now primarily inside blog... with our current setup we would probably create new modules for stuff like that on standard website pages
However our blogs are handled by a different team that is not familiar with the ins and outs of all the modules, and only need some small things like mentioned above
Also, our blog templates only allow for RTE, they're not set up for DnD

Ah, I just realized the blog content WYSIWYG editor is actually different than the Rich Text Editor in pages. And thus there isn't a fields.json file to work with. Would something like that be possible with blogs?
